entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

想系統的學習日語嗎? 那就從這開始吧。 本軟體是一款學習類應用，循序漸進的收錄了25課初級有聲課程和25課進階有聲教程，包含單詞,句型,會話,語法和課後聽力五個部分，音頻和視頻全部高清重制。通過手機的移動性便攜性，幫助各界朋友隨時隨地的學習和查閱教材的內容，使各個層次的學習者都能夠迅速的強化日語的聽說讀寫能力。 在每課的單詞部分，會有對該課單詞的簡單練習，可以順序或隨機的進行日譯中,中譯日或聽力測試,對單詞的記憶有著非常好的幫助。 每個單詞均支持3D按壓，可以通過按壓進行在線翻譯。 所有單詞可按五星等級進行收藏，方便您經常摘錄重點或難以記憶的單詞,以便反復練習和查閱。 支持單詞收藏雲同步，可以讓您在不同設備之間無縫切換。 會話可隱藏指定角色對話內容來進行角色扮演。另附有真人視頻增強日語學習語境。 全文朗讀功能，可一鍵朗讀課文的單詞、文型、例文、會話部分，方便在出門或忙碌時練習聽力。可線控暫停和繼續播放，可線控進行下一段和上一段跳轉。 支持Spotlight，可在手機主頁直接下拉搜索欄進行單詞搜索並直接跳轉。 願這款軟體能夠幫助各界朋友愉快的系統的學習日語。 主要功能: 1. 系統的,循序漸進的學習初級日語 2. 分為單詞,句型,會話,語法和課後聽力五個部分 3. 單詞,句型,會話和聽力均配有真人高質量發音 4. 靈活的單詞收藏和練習功能 5. 自動和手動的會話朗讀模式 6. 會話的角色扮演功能以模擬對話場景 7. 會話附有視頻以增強日語學習語境 8. 一鍵朗讀課文全部內容,待機時也可練習聽力 9. 超強的線控功能 10. 超詳細的單詞翻譯引擎 11. 支持繁體中文和簡體中文

entry.title: Exif Viewer by Fluntro
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$90.00 → $30.00 [$30.00 ~ $90.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$30.00

应用描述

由 Apple 推薦在美國和加拿大的 App Store 上。享受一次性購買，終身訪問 — 無需訂閱。 Fluntro 的 EXIF Viewer 是專業攝影師和 iPhone 愛好者查看、管理和編輯 EXIF 元數據的終極工具。憑藉簡潔的設計和流暢的功能，此應用程式在所有 iOS 設備（iPhone、iPad、iPod Touch）上提供和諧的體驗。 主要功能： • 刪除 EXIF 元數據和地理標籤：通過輕鬆刪除 EXIF 數據（包括 GPS 位置），保護您的隱私。 • 查看詳細的 EXIF 數據：輕鬆訪問重要的元數據，如 ISO、快門速度、焦距、相機型號、鏡頭型號、時間戳、光圈等，適用於您設備中的任何照片、iCloud 或 Photo Stream。 • 放大大照片：享受高達 80 MB 的高清晰度圖像。 • 自訂您的 EXIF 標籤：通過重新排列 EXIF 標籤、隱藏不需要的標籤以及選擇您的首選日期格式來個性化您的查看體驗。 • 快速導航：在 EXIF 詳細信息屏幕上，輕鬆向左或向右滑動即可在照片之間切換。 • 地圖視圖：通過點擊每張照片，查看帶有詳細 EXIF 信息的照片在地圖上的位置。 • 批量編輯 EXIF 數據：高效地為多張照片修改 EXIF 元數據，包括日期和位置的更改。 • 有或沒有 EXIF 數據分享照片：通過電子郵件、AirDrop 或其他方式輕鬆分享照片，無論是否帶有 EXIF 元數據。 • 複製 EXIF 數據：輕鬆複製和分享元數據至不同應用程式。 • 保留 EXIF 元數據：通過郵件、AirDrop 或 SD 卡讀取器發送的照片將保留 EXIF 元數據，不像大多數消息和社交網絡應用程式。 其他功能： • 支援 3D Touch：在支援的 iPhone 上快速訪問收藏夾、相冊或所有照片等操作。 • 針對所有 iOS 設備進行了優化：相容 iPad Pro、iPhone SE、iPhone 8 及更新機型，並支援橫向和縱向模式。 • 多種查看選項：根據您的偏好，選擇 EXIF 卡片列表視圖、網格視圖或地圖視圖。 • 照片擴展：在原生照片應用或第三方應用中，選擇照片並點擊分享按鈕，即可直接訪問 EXIF 數據。 • 支援 iMessage 應用：輕鬆查看和分享 EXIF 數據到您的消息中。 編輯和刪除 EXIF 元數據： • 批量編輯 EXIF 數據：選擇多張照片，點擊“編輯 EXIF”，並更新元數據，如日期和位置。 • 刪除 EXIF 元數據： 1. 覆蓋原始照片以刪除 EXIF 元數據。 2. 創建不帶 EXIF 數據的副本照片，並可選擇刪除原始照片。 常見問題解答 什麼是 EXIF 元數據？ EXIF 是可交換圖像文件格式的縮寫。當您使用數碼相機或手機拍攝照片時，會有大量的 EXIF 數據被記錄並存儲在每張圖片中。這些數據包括相機設置的信息（ISO、光圈、焦距、圖像尺寸、快門速度、相機型號、鏡頭型號、GPS）、日期、時間、位置等。查看 EXIF 元數據標籤對於初學者和專業攝影師都至關重要，能幫助他們了解並回顧創建和編輯照片時使用的相機設置或軟件。 為什麼選擇 Fluntro 的 EXIF Viewer？ • 無應用內購買：僅需一次性購買，即可享受當前和未來的所有功能 — 無隱藏費用。 • 為專業攝影師設計：深入了解您的攝影作品，通過刪除敏感元數據保護您的隱私。 • 隱私優先：您的照片安全地存儲在手機上，永遠不會上傳到我們的伺服器。詳情請查看我們的隱私政策。 用戶評論： 如果您對該應用感到滿意，請考慮留下五星好評。您的反饋有助於我們改進並確保為所有用戶提供最佳體驗。

entry.title: Trackless Links Pro
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$690.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ $690.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

应用描述

Take back control of your browsing experience. Trackless Links Pro is the universal Safari extension for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that removes tracking parameters, enables custom redirects, and gives you control over website behaviors. UNIVERSAL PURCHASE - ONE APP, ALL YOUR DEVICES Buy once and enjoy Trackless Links Pro on iPhone, iPad, and Mac. Your settings sync seamlessly via iCloud - start on your Mac and continue on your iPhone or iPad without missing a beat. WHAT IT DOES • Removes tracking parameters (utm_*, fbclid, gclid, etc.) before they follow you around • Custom redirects (e.g. reddit → old.reddit) with plain text or regex patterns • Share Sheet integration - open links from any app to clean or archive them • Quick access to archived web pages via Wayback Machine and other services • Optional tweaks: stop autoplay, restore text selection, prevent exit popups, and more WHY IT'S USEFUL Cleaner links are easier to share. Redirects save time. Archive access finds cached versions of changed pages. Everything runs locally - no accounts, no data collection, no external services. TRACKING BLOCKER Removes common tracking parameters on the fly. Nothing leaves your devices. URL REDIRECTS Create and reorder custom rules. Includes 20+ predefined redirects focusing on privacy and alternative frontends (Reddit, Twitter/X, YouTube, Medium, and more). Disable or enable individually. Regex supported. SEARCH ARCHIVE One-tap access to cached web page snapshots via Wayback Machine. Access from the extension popup on any device. iCLOUD SYNC Keep settings synchronized across all devices. Filters, redirects, and tweaks sync automatically and immediately. Set it up once - your preferences follow you everywhere (statistics remain device-specific). BROWSER TWEAKS Selective opt-in controls: copy/select unlock, autoplay block, playback speed lock, PiP enable, URL clean-on-copy, redirector bypass, cookie banner suppression (experimental), dark mode, zoom limit removal, animation reduction, and more. Configure once, works everywhere. KEY FEATURES • Universal Purchase - one price for iPhone, iPad, and Mac • Complete privacy - everything runs on your devices (zero data collection) • Native apps for iOS, iPadOS, and macOS with full feature parity • Seamless iCloud sync keeps everything synchronized automatically • Share from anywhere - open links from Reddit, X, and other apps • Fully customizable with personal filter and redirect rules • Advanced pattern matching with regex support for power users • Lightning-fast execution that loads before pages finish rendering • Ultra-lightweight with no battery drain or background activity • Works offline - no internet connection required DESIGN PRINCIPLES Plain language. User control. No dark patterns. Opt-in for anything that might change page behavior. One purchase, all platforms. IMPORTANT NOTES Tweaks may not work on all websites due to varying designs and security policies. All tweaks can be disabled if they cause issues. Cookie banner management is experimental. SUPPORT & FEEDBACK Bug reports and feature requests: https://github.com/aloth/trackless-links/issues PRIVACY No tracking, analytics, remote calls, or data retention. Everything runs on-device. EULA Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/ READY FOR CLEANER BROWSING EVERYWHERE? Download Trackless Links Pro - fast, private, and on your terms.

entry.title: Solo - Fretboard Visualization
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$490.00 → $320.00 [$320.00 ~ $490.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$320.00

App內購買

  • Custom Chord Progressions：$190.00

应用描述

Solo is the ultimate practice App for mastering fretboard visualization, designed by world renowned guitarists Tom Quayle and David Beebee. Four powerful fretboard trainers allow you to work intuitively on each aspect of the visualization process; learning note names, memorising interval shapes, outlining chord changes, and practicing scales. Solo asks you to find intervallic functions against one root note, chord symbol or scale at a time, listens to the notes you play, and doesn’t move on until you’ve correctly found each note by its intervallic function in the specified order. Practice with Solo and finally learn your note names, master interval shapes, confidently play through chord changes and break out of scale boxes with intervallic functions. Start transforming your playing and confidence on the fretboard today! NOTE TRAINER The Note Trainer is perfect for beginner and intermediate players getting to grips with note names on the neck - the foundation of solid fretboard knowledge. ‣ Solo shows you random root notes to find and listens, waiting for you to get it correct. ‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‣ Optional practice suggestions offer challenging ways to limit and test yourself. ‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. INTERVAL TRAINER The Interval Trainer will help players at all levels work on interval shapes with intervallic functions - the key to unlocking true freedom on the fretboard. ‣ Choose any combination of intervallic functions to practice. ‣ Create custom interval groups or choose the intervals for ANY chord type or scale. ‣ The Interval Trainer will randomise your chosen intervals and ask you to find them against either a fixed or random root note. ‣ Slide on the interactive fretboards for helpful diagrams, showing you where all of the interval shapes are across the neck, and to study alternative options. Choose from 6 string guitar (standard and 4ths tuning), 7 string guitar, 4 string bass & 5 string bass. ‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session. CHANGES TRAINER In the Changes Trainer you find intervallic functions, using single notes to outline different chord types or sets of chord changes, a key skill for learning to improvise through chord changes. ‣ Practice outlining intervallic functions through over 100 common chord progressions and single chord exercises. ‣ 50 intervallic function levels. Go from simple chord tones to complex melodic structures and scales. ‣ Solo intelligently maps out the correct intervals over each chord and listens for you to play each intervallic function in the specified order. ‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‣ Transpose the key of any progression or exercise. ‣ Choose to randomly transpose the progression (or single chord exercise) each time it repeats. ‣ Work on voice leading chord tones through single note lines. SCALE TRAINER The Scale Trainer contains a vast array of scales and powerful workout options, allowing you to finally break out of the box and develop a much deeper understanding of how scales are constructed on the fretboard. ‣ Practice finding scales on the fretboard using intervallic functions. ‣ Over 50+ Scales and modes. ‣ Powerful workout options provide almost limitless ways to challenge yourself. ‣ Melodic sequence options let you focus on starting from any chord tone within the scale. ‣ Duration based workouts allow you to craft the perfect practice session.

Discover how to easily turn any Sun, Moon and Milky Way scene you imagine into a real picture… and start shooting truly legendary photos every time you pick up the camera! Whether your passion is to capture beautiful landscapes, immortalize the infinite night sky, surprise the bride and the groom in their happiest day... or to travel the world, PhotoPills will make you love exploring new artistic possibilities to tell visual stories in a way it wasn’t possible before. * All in one app PhotoPills is your iPhone and iPad personal assistant in all photographic matters. It provides tasty remedies to answer most of the questions when planning and shooting your creative ideas: - The First 2D Map-Centric Planner: Sun, Moon, Milky Way - Sun, Moon Alignments Fast Finder - 3D Augmented Reality: Sun, Moon, Milky Way, Celestial Equator, Polaris, DoF, FoV - Photo Plans Manager - Location Scouting Tool - Key information: Sunrise/set, Twilights, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Moonrise/set, Supermoon dates, Moon Calendar - Calculators: Long Exposure, Timelapse, Spot Stars, Star Trails, Hyperfocal Table, DoF, FoV - Widgets: Sun, Moon, Milky Way - PhotoPills Awards… and much more! * Endorsed by Masters “PhotoPills is an invaluable tool which I use every time I plan a shoot.” – Mark Gee, Astronomy Photographer of the Year. “A tool every photographer should have.” – Kevin Raber, Luminous-landscape.com. “It pays off! Using such a tool ensures that we are repeatedly capable of quickly planning powerful shots; leaving maximum opportunity for more creative ruminations.” – José B. Ruiz, Innovation Award, Wildlife Photographer of the Year. * How it works Have you ever walked around a place and thought: "What a pity the Moon isn't EXACTLY right there... I would have captured a great photo!"? What about the Sun? And the Milky Way? Well, now you can let your imagination fly and calculate when this specific magic moment happens in just a few seconds: - IMAGINE: the Milky Way arching over a powerful landscape, a giant full Moon appearing from behind a nearby hill or a sunset between two rocks on a magic beach... The only limit is your imagination! - PLAN: easily calculate the exact date and time the scene you’ve imagined happens. Work smarter, not harder! - SHOOT: just get out there, immerse yourself in the great outdoors, and enjoy living and capturing unique moments. * Become a Legend Because we know the huge amount of time, energy and love you put in your photos. We want to HONOR them, SHOW them to the World, and REWARD you with up to $6,600 in cash prizes. It's easy and FREE! Just submit your creative photos from PhotoPills and join the Legacy! * Never waste an unmissable scene again Create a To-Do list of planned photos and get to the location on time. * Get it right Adjust your frame for the best composition before you shoot. Use the 3D Augmented Reality Views to see whether Sun, Moon and Milky Way will be at the desired position when pressing the shutter. * Explore, discover great places and create your own database of locations If you come across a location you’d like to remember, save it as a Point of Interest. * Enjoy all daily information in just one swipe with the Widgets Just swipe down from the top of the screen to get all the Sun, Moon and Milky Way events for your current location and date, in addition to your upcoming photo plans. * Get more than an app Our goal is not only to help you plan your shots, but also to help you nail them. Whenever you need help, take a look at our How-To articles and videos, join our free online courses or just contact us! “This is your last chance. After this, there is no turning back. You take the blue pill – the story ends, you wake up in your bed and believe whatever you want to believe. You take PhotoPills – you stay in Wonderland and we show you how deep the rabbit-hole goes. Remember: all we’re offering are Legendary Photos and Goosebumps in your skin, nothing more.”

entry.title: AeroPads - Pads & Soundscapes
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$220.00 → $30.00 [$30.00 ~ $320.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$30.00

App內購買

  • Orbit Pack：$30.00
  • Rocket Science Pack：$30.00

应用描述

Have you ever struggled to find confidence on stage or inspiration in the studio? AeroPads cues immersive pads and soundscapes that inspire and equip you to perform and write your best. ENHANCE YOUR SOUND. ENGAGE YOUR AUDIENCE. Every musician has experienced an empty mix or an awkward transition. When using AeroPads, you instantly add more dimension and character to your sound. With a more immersive mix and the ability to perform smooth and seamless transitions, you will feel more confident while your audience will be more engaged. FOR EVERY MUSICIAN. Pads and soundscapes are a versatile accompaniment to nearly any style of music. Whether you are a soloist or full band, AeroPads will take your sound to the next level. Rock bands, worship teams, wedding singers, producers, songwriters, and instrumentalists are just a few of the many types of musicians that have loved using AeroPads. DESIGNED FOR THE STAGE. INSPIRED BY SPACE. AeroPads features creative and immersive soundscapes paired with a beautiful and intuitive interface, all inspired by the pinnacle of exploration and inspiration: outer space. CREATIVITY THAT SPARKS CREATIVITY. AeroPads aren't your typical pads. Most pads out there are really boring or insanely obnoxious. However, AeroPads features thoughtfully crafted soundscapes that are meticulously fine-tuned with the perfect amount of harmonic and textural movement. Simply put, AeroPads won't step on the toes of your arrangement or get on the nerves of your sound guy (like most other pads out there). Highlighted Features: - A beautiful space-inspired interface with a simple and intuitive design. - Live View: Every key and three of your favorite patches are instantly accessible (best suited for experimentation, free-flowing sets, and songwriting). - Setlist View: Plan and build a detailed setlist (best suited for structured sets and seamless transitions). - The iconic Atmosphere Soundpack which includes five unique patches named after and inspired by the layers of Earth's atmosphere. - Three patches can be added to Live View to be made instantly accessible, so there's no need to dig through menus to just to change a patch when performing live. - Additional patches and Soundpacks available for purchase. - Key-specific pads in multiple tonalities: major, minor, and neutral. - Concert pitch adjustment. How to Use: 01. Cue a pad that matches the key of your musical arrangement. 02. Play overtop of the accompanying pads and soundcapes. 03. Enjoy the boost of audience engagement, musician confidence, and creative inspiration. Pads and soundscapes are intended as a subtle accompaniment to musical arrangements/performances. They are designed to be cued according to the key of the arrangement. Once cued, you'll hear a droning pad centered around the root note with additional harmonic textures within the selected key. The only time a pad's key should change within a song is in the instance of a key change. For best results, mix AeroPads appropriately within the overall mix. When mixed too loud, AeroPads may compete with melodies and the arrangement. When mixed too quietly, AeroPads may be less effective. When mixed appropriately, they will sound awesome.

entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$490.00 → $320.00 [$320.00 ~ $490.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$320.00

应用描述

以嶄新的畫質與音質復活的《FINAL FANTASY IV》像素複刻版。 著名RPG遊戲《FF》系列第四作現已通過精美鮮明的2D畫面回歸。 原版的氣氛與樂趣有了更大的提升，玩家可以更輕鬆地享受這一不朽篇章。 強大的軍事國家巴隆有一支名為赤翼隊的精銳飛空艇部隊，而帶領這支隊伍的隊長塞西爾對不斷侵略他國的任務感到十分苦惱，最終堅定了與摯友和戀人一同逃離這個國家的心意，然而…… 圍繞著水晶，以地面、地底、幻界、乃至月球為舞臺而展開的波瀾壯闊的故事就此展開。 以暗黑騎士塞西爾為首，還有龍騎士凱因，白魔法師羅莎、召喚士莉蒂亞等不同職業、能力各異的同伴登場。還有戲劇性的劇情以及多彩的戰鬥都等著你的到來。 從本作開始，戰鬥系統變為了“即時戰鬥”，提高了緊張感與戰略性的“ATB”也成為了《FINAL FANTASY》系列的代名詞。 而本作正是為之後的進化打下了堅實的基礎的人氣作。 --------------------------------------------- ■以嶄新的畫質與音質完美復活！ ・創造出代表《FF》的點陣角色的澀谷員子也加入進重制隊伍之中，所有的畫面都以鮮活的2D得以重現。 ・為《FF》的世界注入生命的諸多名曲，也都在作曲者植松伸夫先生的完全監修之下獲得改編。 ■更加輕鬆地體驗遊戲！ ・複刻版搭載了經過全面改良的UI系統、自動戰鬥與自動保存功能，方便玩家能更加愉悅地體驗遊戲。 ・支援控制器操作。將控制器連接上機器，就能以控制器專用UI遊玩遊戲。 ・還追加了怪物圖鑒、插畫鑒賞與音樂鑒賞等能夠更進一步享受遊戲世界的要素。 ・BGM音源可以在本作的“改編”設定和原作的“原版”設定中進行切換。 ・追加了“遇敵開關”和“獲得經驗值0~4倍”等功能，大幅增加了遊戲的趣味性。 ※本應用程式為完全買斷制。下載之後可一直遊玩至遊戲結局。 ※本作為以1991年發售的原版《FINAL FANTASY IV》為基礎開發的複刻版。不包含一部分其他重製版中變更、追加的要素。 【對應OS】 iOS13.0及以上 【推薦機種】 iPhone7 Plus／iPad(第7代)／iPad Air(第3代)／iPad mini(第5代) 及以上

应用描述

This eye-care extension enables night mode by creating dark themes for websites on the fly. Dark Reader inverts bright colors, making web pages high contrast and easier to read at night. It perfectly suits system dark mode. The app includes multiple beautiful color themes. Choose between dark mode, colored, dimmed and screen shader themes, or create your own by tuning background and text colors. Enable or disable the extension for specific websites, auto-toggle based on system dark mode preferences, or activate dark theme detection to leave already dark websites untouched. Dark Reader's algorithms have been developed since 2014 by experts in the web development industry and evolve alongside modern web technologies to deliver fast and reliable dark mode support. Dark Reader doesn't show ads and doesn't collect any data. Before you install, disable similar extensions. Activate Dark Reader in Safari preferences. Enjoy browsing!

entry.title: Jump Desktop (RDP, VNC, Fluid)
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$490.00 → $320.00 [$320.00 ~ $490.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$320.00

应用描述

Leave your laptop behind. Enjoy the freedom to work from anywhere. Jump Desktop is a remote desktop application that lets you securely connect to any computer in the world. Compatible with both RDP and VNC, Jump Desktop is secure, reliable and very easy to set up. Jump Desktop also supports our own, high performance, next generation remote desktop protocol called Fluid Remote Desktop. Easy setup and reliable: Jump Desktop is very easy to setup; anyone can do it! Just visit: https://jumpdesktop.com on your PC or Mac, click the ‘Automatic Setup’ link and follow step-by-step instructions. You’ll be up and running in no time. Also - not subscriptions! Secure: Jump encrypts the connection between computers to ensure privacy and security. Automatic connections are always encrypted by default. Supports NLA, TLS/SSL encryption for RDP. SSH Tunnelling and SSL/TLS encryption for VNC. Fluid Remote Desktop uses DTLS for secure connections. Powerful features: * Works with almost any computer and operating system. * Supports physical mice! On iOS 13 and iPadOS, Jump Desktop supports the accessibility mouse with some limitations. Jump Desktop also supports special physical mice with no limitations. For more information visit https://jumpdesktop.com/mice. * Fluid Remote Desktop protocol supports high performance remote desktop and audio. * Easy and secure setup: Automatically configure your PC or Mac for remote access using Wi-Fi/3G/LTE without worrying about your router settings. Setup as many computers as you like – there are no limits! * Built for iPad Pro, iPad, iPhone and iPod * iPad Pro features: Full support for split-screen multitasking and Apple Pencil. * Open multiple simultaneous connections * Live connection previews * Protect your server settings using Touch ID * Connection syncing via iCloud connection syncing * Advanced Bluetooth keyboard: The best bluetooth keyboard support on the App Store. Shortcuts, function keys and arrow keys - everything works. Also includes macros for keys no available on bluetooth keyboards (i.e function keys) * SSH tunneling with password and public key authentication supported * Supports large custom screen resolutions and VGA/HDMI out * Full mouse support via touch gestures: left, right and middle button clicks, dragging, scrolling, precision pointer movement * Multiple gesture support - includes the ability to draw or write using your finger * Copy/paste: Transfer text to or from your computer using the pasteboard * HDMI/VGA external monitor support: View your desktop on an external monitor using a cable or AirPlay. Jump Desktop will let you utilize you external display as a true monitor (not as a mirror like other apps on the store). * Multi-core rendering engine makes Jump Desktop one of the fastest RDP and VNC engines on the planet * Full support for Linea and Infinea barcode and MSR scanners. Includes support for E2E encryption. RDP features: * Supports RD Gateway * Supports custom resolutions. Set any resolution you want including Retina resolutions. * Dynamic RDP resolution updates on Windows 8.1+ * Remote printing: Send print outs from your computer to your iPad/iPhone device (exclusive RDP print redirection feature on the App Store!) * Folder sharing * Audio streaming * Console sessions * International keyboard layouts * Multiple monitor support on Windows 7+ * Multi-touch redirection support on Windows 8+ Fluid Features: * Super high performance, adaptive remote desktop * Audio streaming * Strong encryption built into the protocol * Connect from anywhere, even restricted networks without requiring networking knowledge * Clipboard sharing VNC features: * Tested with Mac OS X, TightVNC, RealVNC, UltraVNC, Linux (Ubuntu Remote Desktop) * Secure: Supports SSH tunneling as well as SSL encryption * Black & white, gray scale, 8, 16 and 24-bit color to help optimize bandwidth * Multiple monitor support * Macs: Support locking the Mac's screen and syncing the pasteboard

entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：$690.00 → $590.00 [$590.00 ~ $690.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：$590.00

应用描述

High-quality on-device transcription. Easily convert speech to text from meetings, lectures, and more. The transcription is powered by OpenAI's Whisper running locally on your device. Nothing leaves your device. You can export the transcription as subtitles too. It has a word-replacement feature to let you automatically fix common mistakes. Aiko favors accuracy over speed. It does not do live transcription while recording. It does not currently have speaker detection. Try the trial first. See website. Note: Sharing from Voice Memos on iOS 26 does not work because of a iOS 26 bug outside of my control. Supports audio in 100 different languages: Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Bashkir, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Breton, Bulgarian, Burmese, Catalan, Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, Estonian, Faroese, Finnish, French, Galician, Georgian, German, Greek, Gujarati, Haitian Creole, Hausa, Hawaiian, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Javanese, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Korean, Lao, Latin, Latvian, Lingala, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malagasy, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Marathi, Mongolian, Māori, Nepali, Norwegian, Norwegian Nynorsk, Occitan, Pashto, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Punjabi, Romanian, Russian, Sanskrit, Serbian, Shona, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Somali, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Tagalog, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Thai, Tibetan, Turkish, Turkmen, Ukrainian, Urdu, Uzbek, Vietnamese, Welsh, Yiddish, Yoruba The app was made possible thanks to Whisper by OpenAI and whisper.cpp by Georgi Gerganov. ■ FAQ ‣ Can I edit the text in the app? I don't plan to support any editing. Export the transcription and edit it in a proper text editor. ‣ Why is the app so large? The app delivers the highest quality transcription on the market for 100 different languages. Rather than asking why it's so large, the real question is how is it so small. ‣ Why is the transcription so slow? The app favors accuracy over speed. However, performance is expected to improve in the coming months. ‣ Why must I keep the iOS app open while it transcribes? iOS apps are fundamentally restricted from operating in the background for extended periods. ‣ Can I delete some of the languages to save space? This is unfortunately not possible. The model has all the languages stored together in a way that makes it impossible to remove just some languages. More FAQs on the website. ■ Technical details The app uses the Whisper medium or small model on iOS depending on available memory and the large v3 model on macOS. ■ Privacy The transcription is done locally on your device. Nothing leaves your device. ■ Support You can contact me through the feedback button in the app.

应用描述

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but don’t forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

应用描述

LumaFusion: 影片編輯的終極敘事體驗 歡迎體驗 App Store 2021「年度最佳 App」及「編輯精選獎」的得獎 App！我們是世界各地故事創作者的專業標準，提供流暢直觀、為觸控螢幕而設計的剪輯體驗。 【專業剪輯從此簡單又輕鬆】 • 6 條影音軌 / 圖像軌道：建立多層編輯，並平滑處理 4K ProRes 和 HDR 媒體。 • 另外 6 條音軌：建立聲景。 • 終極時間軸體驗：使用全球最靈活的軌道及磁性時間軸，實現流暢編輯。 • 大量過場效果：讓您的故事持續推進。 • 在外接顯示器上顯示預覽：在大螢幕上查看。 • 加入標記、標籤和備註：計畫案保持井井有條。 • 加入旁白：在播放您的電影的同時錄製旁白。 【圖層效果、色彩校正】 • 綠幕、亮度與色度去背：運用創意來建立圖層合成。 • Lock and Load 穩定器：保持鏡頭穩定。 • 強大的色彩校正：打造您自己的風格。 • 視頻波形、向量和直方圖範圍。 • LUT 色彩檔：匯入並套用多個 .cube 或 .3dl LUT 色彩檔。 • 關鍵影格無限數量：精準製作動畫效果。 • 自訂文字和效果預設值：儲存並分享你喜歡的動畫效果和外觀。 • 網格和參考線：精確對齊元素與標題安全區域、動作安全區域和水平線。 【進階音訊控制】 • 使用圖示型等化器、參數型等化器、聲音隔離功能：完美調整音訊細節。 • 關鍵影格音訊電平、聲像、等化器：進行完美混音。 • 支援立體聲和雙單聲道音訊：適用於在單一片段中使用多個麥克風的訪談。 • 使用自動迴避：在話語期間迴避音樂，保持音訊平衡。 • 第三方音訊擴充程式：增強聲音效果。 【創意標題字幕、多層文字】 • 建立多層標題字幕：將圖形、圖像和文字加入您的圖形中。 • 自行調整字體、顏色、填充顏色、邊框和陰影：設計出引人注目的標題字幕。 • 匯入自訂字體：增強您的品牌。 • 儲存並分享標題字幕預設值：非常適合協作。 【計畫案彈性管理、媒體素材庫】 • 涵蓋所有不同需求的長寬比：包括寬銀幕電影、社群媒體影片或更多其他需求。 • 影格率範圍為 18fps-240fps：可靈活應用於任何工作流程。 • 直接編輯來自 USB-C 硬碟、「照片」App 和 Frame.io 的媒體項目：讓你隨時隨地存取媒體內容。 • 從雲端匯入媒體：自選儲存空間，沒有限制。 【分享剪輯成果】 • 控制解析度、畫質和格式： • 將電影分享至社交媒體、本地儲存或雲端儲存。 • 跨裝置剪輯：輕鬆無縫傳輸計畫案。 增強功能（可單獨購買，或作為創作者通行證訂閱的一部分獲取所有功能 - 請參見下文） • 速度調節與增強關鍵幀 - 使用這個獨一無二且易於使用的功能，創建速度調節、貝茲曲線和緩動效果。 • XML 匯出：將你的計畫案匯出到 Mac 上的 Final Cut Pro • Multicam Studio「多機工作室」：同步 6 個攝影機或音訊，點一下即可切換角度 創作者通行證訂閱 • 享用 Storyblocks for LumaFusion：數百萬首高品質免版稅音樂、音效和視頻，還可獲得上述所有增強功能。 【免費優質支援服務】 • 線上教學：www.youtube.com/@LumaTouch • 參考指南：luma-touch.com/lumafusion-reference-guide • 支援：luma-touch.com/support

应用描述

《身為警察》（This Is the Police）是一個策略/冒險遊戲，故事背景設定在一個螺旋式圍繞排水系統的城市。在遊戲中你將擔任堅韌不拔的警察局長傑克·博伊德的角色，你將潛入一個關於犯罪和陰謀的深刻故事。傑克會不會拿到一大筆錢安心地退休，亦或是最終會破產...還是更糟？ - 你的任務很明確：在傑克·博伊德退休之前的180天內賺到50萬美元。怎麼賺？一切由你決定！ - 決定，決定！《身為警察》（This Is the Police）的故事核心是一個黑暗的故事，以及你該如何破解它。無論你決定什麼，你的選擇都會影響比賽 - 以及傑克博伊德的命運。 - 《黃昏三鏢客》？弗里堡警察局局長能夠應付各種人。遊戲全看你的本事，找到壞人並決定如何處理他們。 - 履行你的職責。作為弗里堡警察局的負責人，傑克每天都要處理各種各樣的挑戰：應對緊急情況，管理他的警員，保衛部門對抗市政廳和腐敗的市長等等。 - 執行調查並收集針對弗里堡犯罪團伙的證據。 - 處理城市中的競爭力量。每個人都可向你提供服務，但每一個都是有代價的。 - 豐富而完整的配音故事：由《毀滅公爵》的配音演員Jon St. John為傑克·博伊德配音。

The original farming and life simulation game that started it all is now available on iOS with a full Harvest Moon experience and original story! Tasked with the job of revitalizing a farm, you'll need to befriend the villagers in town to unlock the Seeds of Memories! Harvest Moon has always been about building a successful life, which means running a successful farm, and also building a meaningful life with friends and family. It is completely up to you on how you accomplish that! Are you up to the challenge of collecting all of the Seeds of Memories?
